reviewText: I like to use to help teach my students about Native American history.  It is a good movie for this.  Many people do not know this part of American history.

This is one story that needs to be remembered as part of this nation's past. The Navajo people are still here today and their story deserves to be remembered as part of the fabric of these United States. I appreciated the information which expands my understanding about the Navajo and the diversity of this country. The Long Walk: Tears of the Navajo
